cost.trigger: The user declares a Rock-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Rock-Type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack has its Type changed to Fire until the end of the user's Activation.

actions.name: Foundry
actions.description: Passive: The user's Fire-Type attacks have their Power increased by 30%.
